About me

I'm Luan and I'm a

Based in Manchester, United Kingdom.


I've not always been a developer, for 02 years I was a Civil Engineer in Brazil. I moved to uk in 2020 and decided it was a time for a change.


I am passionate about knowledge and new challenges, I have worked in many fields in this life, as a call centre, developing android applications for mobile phone, antenna installation, cad technician, among many other roles, in all of them I tried to do my best and in the best way possible, during these years I got a lot of knowledge.


Years of engineering training have given me excellent skills in problem solving, leadership, teamwork and communication, I now have the ability to work focused and be responsible on projects large and small.
